channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS

item.title: CVE-2022-23797|2024-09-16T17:28:28.264Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Inadequate filtering on the selected Ids on an request could resulted into an possible SQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2020-35613|2024-09-16T20:38:00.537Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.22. Improper filter blacklist configuration leads to a SQL injection vulnerability in the backend user list.

item.title: CVE-2022-23800|2024-09-16T19:35:06.733Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2022-23801|2024-09-16T19:35:51.135Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Possible XSS atack vector through SVG embedding in com_media.

item.title: CVE-2022-27913|2024-09-16T17:15:02.209Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.2.0 through 4.2.3. Inadequate filtering of potentially malicious user input leads to reflected XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2021-26035|2024-09-16T17:43:25.266Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.27. Inadequate escaping in the rules field of the JForm API leads to a XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-23795|2024-09-16T17:19:08.109Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. A user row was not bound to a specific authentication mechanism which could under very special circumstances allow an account takeover.

item.title: CVE-2021-23125|2024-09-16T17:27:49.143Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.1.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of escaping of image-related parameters in multiple com_tags views cause lead to XSS attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-26028|2024-09-16T20:46:55.537Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.24. Extracting an specifilcy crafted zip package could write files outside of the intended path.

item.title: CVE-2022-23799|2024-09-16T16:37:47.886Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Under specific circumstances, JInput pollutes method-specific input bags with $_REQUEST data.

item.title: CVE-2022-23793|2024-09-16T20:59:09.256Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.10.6 & 4.0.0 through 4.1.0. Extracting an specifilcy crafted tar package could write files outside of the intended path.

item.title: CVE-2021-23124|2024-09-16T16:23:39.058Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.9.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of escaping in mod_breadcrumbs aria-label attribute allows XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-35616|2024-09-16T18:55:49.368Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 1.7.0 through 3.9.22. Lack of input validation while handling ACL rulesets can cause write ACL violations.

item.title: CVE-2021-23126|2024-09-16T19:56:11.607Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.9.24. Usage of the insecure rand() function within the process of generating the 2FA secret.

item.title: CVE-2021-26039|2024-09-16T16:24:06.780Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.27. Inadequate escaping in the imagelist view of com_media leads to a XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-26030|2024-09-16T20:12:29.345Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.25. Inadequate escaping allowed XSS attacks using the logo parameter of the default templates on error page

item.title: CVE-2021-23123|2024-09-16T17:19:11.273Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.23. The lack of ACL checks in the orderPosition endpoint of com_modules leak names of unpublished and/or inaccessible modules.

item.title: CVE-2020-35611|2024-09-16T20:02:48.985Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.22. The globlal configuration page does not remove secrets from the HTML output, disclosing the current values.

item.title: CVE-2021-26033|2024-09-16T19:41:37.124Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 3.0.0 through 3.9.26. A missing token check causes a CSRF vulnerability in the AJAX reordering endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2021-26036|2024-09-16T20:11:38.041Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 2.5.0 through 3.9.27. Missing validation of input could lead to a broken usergroups table.

item.title: CVE-2024-27185|2024-08-21T04:33:22.771Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The pagination class includes arbitrary parameters in links, leading to cache poisoning attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27186|2024-08-21T04:33:20.037Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The mail template feature lacks an escaping mechanism, causing XSS vectors in multiple extensions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27184|2024-08-21T04:33:09.276Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate validation of URLs could result into an invalid check whether an redirect URL is internal or not..

item.title: CVE-2024-40743|2024-08-21T04:32:56.059Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The stripImages and stripIframes methods didn't properly process inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27187|2024-08-21T04:32:52.309Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper Access Controls allows backend users to overwrite their username when disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2024-27185|2024-08-20T19:24:23.089Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The pagination class includes arbitrary parameters in links, leading to cache poisoning attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27187|2024-08-20T19:26:50.131Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper Access Controls allows backend users to overwrite their username when disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2024-27185|2024-08-20T16:03:58.015Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The pagination class includes arbitrary parameters in links, leading to cache poisoning attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27186|2024-08-20T16:03:56.863Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The mail template feature lacks an escaping mechanism, causing XSS vectors in multiple extensions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27184|2024-08-20T16:03:51.605Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate validation of URLs could result into an invalid check whether an redirect URL is internal or not..

item.title: CVE-2024-40743|2024-08-20T16:14:02.672Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The stripImages and stripIframes methods didn't properly process inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27187|2024-08-20T16:03:43.540Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper Access Controls allows backend users to overwrite their username when disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-08-02T04:34:57.555Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-26279|2024-08-02T04:34:07.431Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The wrapper extensions do not correctly validate inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-26278|2024-08-02T04:33:52.095Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The Custom Fields component not correctly filter inputs, leading to a XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21730|2024-08-02T04:33:43.196Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21731|2024-08-02T04:33:41.988Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper handling of input could lead to an XSS vector in the StringHelper::truncate method.

item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.
